metadata.name: Metric
metadata.description:
Metric

A logs-based metric. The value of the metric is the number of log entries that match a logs filter.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
logging = gcloud.logging
metric = logging.metric "severe_errors"

metadata.name: name
metadata.description: The client-assigned metric identifier. Metric identifiers are limited to 1000 characters and can include only the following characters: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, and the special characters _-.,+!*',()%/\. The forward-slash character (/) denotes a hierarchy of name pieces, and it cannot be the first character of the name.

metadata.name: description
metadata.description: The description of this metric, which is used in documentation.

metadata.name: description=
metadata.description: Updates the description of this metric, which is used in documentation.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
logging = gcloud.logging
metric = logging.metric "severe_errors"
metric.filter = "logName:syslog AND severity>=ERROR"
metric.save

metadata.name: reload!
metadata.description: Reloads the logs-based metric with current data from the Logging service.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
logging = gcloud.logging
metric = logging.metric "severe_errors"
metric.delete

returns.description: Returns true if the metric was deleted.

metadata.name: ensure_connection!
metadata.description: Raise an error unless an active connection is available.
